item.title: Grouping
item.description: 原文： https://docs.gofiber.io/guide/grouping 🎭 Grouping INFO 信息 In general, the Group functionality in Fiber behaves similarly to ExpressJS. Groups are declared virtually and all routes declared within the group are flattened into a single list with a prefix, which is then checked by the framework in the order it was declared. This means that the behavior of Group in Fiber is identical to that of ExpressJS. ​ 通
